original: Melin, David Samuel, kvrkoherde, Borås, f. 10/4/85 i Valstad, "Skarab. k G. 13 m. Hedvig Elisabet Synnerholim. Barn: Lennart f. 14, kommin., Kerstin 16, g. m. pastor Ingemar Forss, Sune 20, past :adj., Sara 24, sjuksköt :elev. — Stud:ex. i Skara 04, teok fil. ex. i Upps. 05, teok kand. 08, prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. 08. Tredje pred. i Dare-torp 09, andre kommin. i Rångedala 13, kyrkoh. i Kyrkefalla 22, li Borås sed. 39. Prost öv. eg. förs. 47. Ordf. i Borås samfällda kyrkofullm., Gustaf Adolfs o. Brämhults kyrkoråd, Kyr-kefalla skokstyr. 22-38. LNO.
translated: Melin, David Samuel, vicar, Borås, b. 10/4/85 in Valstad, married to Hedvig Elisabet Synnerholim. Children: Lennart b. 14, curate, Kerstin b. 16, married to Pastor Ingemar Forss, Sune b. 20, assistant pastor, Sara b. 24, nursing student. - Studied at Skara's College in 04, theological philosophy degree in Uppsala in 05, theological candidate degree in 08, practical theological examination and ordained as priest in 08. Third preacher in Daretorp in 09, second curate in Rångedala in 13, vicar in Kyrkefalla in 22, now in Borås since 39. Prost over own parish since 47. Chairman of Borås united church council, Gustaf Adolf and Brämhult's church council, Kyrkefalla school board from 22-38. Awarded the Royal Order of the North Star (LNO).

employmentHistory.roleName: Chairman of Borås united church council
Chairman of Gustaf Adolf's church council

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
